description: Provides styles to layout out multiple teasers in one section.

demos.title: Linked Heading
demos.name: linked
demos.description: Standard teaser collection with a linked heading. A linked heading may be applied to any teaser theme.

demos.title: Responsive Heading (full-width on desktop)
demos.name: full-heading
demos.description: The heading border is reduced in size responsively. This can be changed with modifier classes. See the readme for more options.

demos.title: Inverse Heading
demos.name: inverse
demos.description: The heading colour may be inversed for use on a slate (or other dark) background.

demos.title: Collection: horizontal
demos.name: horizontal
demos.description: Teasers in horizontal rather than standard column layout
